title: Garmin vívofit jr. 2: The Power is All Around You
description:
Get ready to feel the power. The vívofit® jr. 2 activity tracker1 for kids features a 1-plus year battery life2 and works with a free companion app3, offering mobile adventures with Captain America and the Avengers. Learn more about this kid-friendly activity tracker here.

Swim-friendly4 kid’s activity tracker with Captain America theme
Features a customizable color screen and 1-plus year battery life; no recharging needed
Kid-tough bands available in stretchy 1-piece design or adjustable bands for older children
Automatically syncs5 with compatible mobile app that includes Captain America and the Avengers mobile adventures for kids plus chore management tools for parents
Tracks steps, sleep and 60 minutes of daily recommended activity

1 Activity tracking accuracy
2 Under typical use; battery life may vary depending on usage
3 Not available for Windows® Phone
4 Water rating
5 When paired with a compatible smartphone

Windows is a trademark of Microsoft®.
